T02D2229:104b-1: ku drishti ni rga ta n'a ma /
T02D2229:104b-3: lta ba ngan pa sel ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2229:104b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2229:104b-6: gang zhig 'di la gnas gyur na //
T02D2229:105a-2: lta ngan sel ba bshad bar bya //
T02D2229:105a-3: 'dir ni sems can ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2229:105a-6: de la lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2229:105a-7: sa la zhugs pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2229:105a-8: lnga la dbang thob par mthar thug pa'i bar du
T02D2229:105a-9: rgyu'i gnas skabs la gnas pa'i slob pa rnams shin
T02D2229:105a-10: tu rnam par dag pa'i las dang po'i cho gas
T02D2229:105a-11: tshogs gnyis bsags nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2229:105a-13: mi slob pa yang de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2229:105a-14: 'bras bu rnam par rtog pa ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyis gsal la /
T02D2229:105a-15: sh'akya thub pa ltar sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs
T02D2229:105a-16: kyi nus pas zung du 'jug pa nyid du 'bad
T02D2229:105a-17: pa med par sems can gyi don byed pa ni
T02D2229:105a-18: // mtshan nyid rgyun mi 'chad par dang bo'i las la 'jug go zhes bya bar gnas so //
T02D2229:105a-20: mgon po sems dpa' mi mnga' zhing //
T02D2229:105a-21: rnam rtog g-yo ba mi mnga' yang //
T02D2229:105a-22: khyod nyid ngang gis 'jig rten la //
T02D2229:105a-24: gzhan don phun tshogs sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D2229:105a-25: 'bras bu gtso bo gzhan ma yin //
T02D2229:105a-26: des na sangs rgyas 'bras bur brjod //
T02D2229:105a-27: kun rtog rlung dmar thams cad kyis //
T02D2229:105a-28: dpag bsam shing ltar mi bskyod pa ;
T02D2229:105a-29: / de ltar sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2229:105a-30: bsam pa ma lus yongs rdzogs byed //
T02D2229:105a-31: 'bras bu de nyid mi mthun phyogs //
T02D2229:105a-32: blang dang dor ba rnam spangs nas //
T02D2229:105a-33: blo ldan rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs //
T02D2229:105a-34: dang po las pa 'bad pas sam //
T02D2229:105a-36: 'on te las dang po pas ni slob pa'i cho
T02D2229:105a-37: ga nyid rigs na'ang mi slob rang bzhin med pa
T02D2229:105a-38: bsgom par gyur pa rnams la las dang po ba'i
T02D2229:105a-39: rtsom pa yod pa ji lta bu /
T02D2229:105a-40: dper na 'dir yang gser gyi sgrog gis bcings pa lta bu nyid do zhe na bden te /
T02D2229:105a-41: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2229:105a-42: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2229:105a-43: de lta bas na rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
T02D2229:105a-44: dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes bstan pa
T02D2229:105a-45: yin no // de yang bcom ldan 'das shes rab
T02D2229:105a-46: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i pha
T02D2229:105a-47: rol tu phyin pa lngas ni pha rol tu phyin
T02D2229:105a-48: pa lngas ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi
T02D2229:105b-0: thob bo zhes gsungs @105b ba dang /
T02D2229:105b-1: 'phags pa dri ma med par grags bas bstan pa
T02D2229:105b-2: zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las kyang
T02D2229:105b-3: / shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs ni 'ching ba'o //
T02D2229:105b-4: thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab kyang 'ching ba'o //
T02D2229:105b-5: shes rab dang bcas pa'i thabs ni thar ba'o //
T02D2229:105b-6: thabs dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyang thar pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D2229:105b-7: 'di dag ni 'di'i bdag nyid bla ma dam pa'i
T02D2229:105b-8: man ngag nyid las sgron ma dang snang ba bzhin
T02D2229:105b-9: du lhan cig skyes pa grub pa bzhin du rtogs
T02D2229:105b-10: par bya'o // de lta bas na /
T02D2229:105b-11: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D2229:105b-12: sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod pa gang //
T02D2229:105b-13: rnal 'byor pa kun bya ba nyid ;
T02D2229:105b-14: / dang po'i las can bstan pa gang //
T02D2229:105b-15: pha rol phyin lngar gang bstan pa //
T02D2229:105b-16: dang po'i las can zhes bya ba //
T02D2229:105b-17: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi //
T02D2229:105b-18: ngo bo nyid ni dpyad mi bya //
T02D2229:105b-20: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T02D2229:105b-21: bsam gtan shes rab la gus pas //
T02D2229:105b-22: rtag tu blo ldan gyis bsten na //
T02D2229:105b-24: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku //
T02D2229:105b-25: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa gsum //
T02D2229:105b-26: bsam gtan shes rab chos kyi'o //
T02D2229:105b-29: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas /
T02D2229:105b-30: shin tu rnam par dag pas gnas par bya'o //
T02D2229:105b-31: zlog pa ni med par smra bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2229:105b-33: dge dang mi dge gang phyir dngos med kyang //
T02D2229:105b-34: de ltar dge ba nyid bya mi dge min //
T02D2229:105b-35: 'jig rten kun rdzob chu yi zla 'dra yang //
T02D2229:105b-36: de las yid 'ong sdug bsngal yid mi bde ;
T02D2229:105b-38: de ltar na slob pas smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la gnas nas /
T02D2229:105b-39: rnam par mi rtog pa myong bar 'dod pas las
T02D2229:105b-40: dang po pa la 'jug pa ji lta bu zhe
T02D2229:105b-41: na / lus sbyin par gtong ba dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ste //
T02D2229:105b-42: lus ni sbyin par btang byas la //
T02D2229:105b-43: phyin nas spyod pa brtsam par bya //
T02D2229:105b-44: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2229:105b-45: lus gtong ba'i sbyin pa dang lus dang ngag dang
T02D2229:105b-46: yid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i
T02D2229:105b-47: tshul khrims dang / grang ba dang /
T02D2229:105b-49: sog les gshag pa la bzod pa'i bzod pa dang /
T02D2229:106a-1: gnod pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang /
T02D2229:106a-2: dngos po thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i 'bad
T02D2229:106a-3: pa med pa'i rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba'i bsam
T02D2229:106a-4: gtan dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs par rjes su brtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes rab ste /
T02D2229:106a-5: 'bad pa med par ro gcig pa'i ngang gis thams
T02D2229:106a-6: cad du ro gcig par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu
T02D2229:106a-7: phyin pa thams cad kyi mchog go //
T02D2229:106a-9: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la gnas pa yang dang po las la 'jug pa nyid yin no //
T02D2229:106a-10: tshu rol mthong bar grags pa nyams pa 'jig rten
T02D2229:106a-11: pha rol slu ba thams cad du rigs pa tsam
T02D2229:106a-12: ma yin pa smra ba ltar ni ma yin no
T02D2229:106a-13: // de la slob ma brtul zhugs can byang chub sems dpa' la ni /
T02D2229:106a-14: dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya //
T02D2229:106a-15: phyin nas bslab pa sbyin par bya //
T02D2229:106a-16: zhes dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gsungs so //
T02D2229:106a-17: dang por gso sbyong sbyin pa ni //
T02D2229:106a-18: btsun pa'am slob dpon dgongs su gsol //
T02D2229:106a-19: bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bya ba /
T02D2229:106a-20: byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02D2229:106a-21: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D2229:106a-22: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bya'o //
T02D2229:106a-23: bdag gsum la skyabs su song bar btsun pas gzung du gsol //
T02D2229:106a-25: bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bgyi ba /
T02D2229:106a-26: dus 'di nas nye bar bzung nas nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du srog chags gsod pa dang /
T02D2229:106a-27: gzhan gyi nor rku ba dang /
T02D2229:106a-28: mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
T02D2229:106a-30: de bzhin du myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba 'thung ba dang /
T02D2229:106a-31: dus ma yin par za ba dang /
T02D2229:106a-37: khri stan chen po las ldog par bgyi'o //
T02D2229:106a-38: bdag yon tan brgyad kyis dgra bcom pa'i tshul du
T02D2229:106a-39: gnas par gyi'o zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong sbyin
T02D2229:106a-40: pa'i tshig ste / byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bas /
T02D2229:106a-42: ma byin par len pa dang /
T02D2229:106a-43: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa la spyad pa dang /
T02D2229:106b-0: rang bzhin gyi @106b kha na ma tho ba dang
T02D2229:106b-1: bcas pas myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba chang 'thung
T02D2229:106b-2: ba dang lnga las log par bgyi'o //
T02D2229:106b-3: mos pa dang spyod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub
T02D2229:106b-4: sems dpa' khyim pa'i mi dge bcu yongs su shes
T02D2229:106b-5: par byas la / yang mi bya bar yongs su bsdam par bya zhing /
T02D2229:106b-6: dge ba'i las rnams ni bya'o //
T02D2229:106b-7: tho rangs kyi thun la langs la gdong bkru ba la sogs byas nas /
T02D2229:106b-8: dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pas /
T02D2229:106b-13: rtog pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsam gtan dang
T02D2229:106b-14: bzlas pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa bya ba'o
T02D2229:106b-15: // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yang lan gsum du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2229:106b-17: aom dzambha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:106b-18: zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i chu khyor ba
T02D2229:106b-19: brgya rtsa brgyad dpal gnod gnas la dbul bar bya'o
T02D2229:106b-20: // de nas na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te /
T02D2229:106b-21: aom sambha ra sambha ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02D2229:106b-22: zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i sngags lan bdun bzlas shing /
T02D2229:106b-23: lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo lnga brkyang pa las /
T02D2229:106b-24: bdud rtsi lngas sgo drung na 'dug pa'i gtor ma'i
T02D2229:106b-25: zas chu dang bcas pa zan 'bru gcig gi kyang
T02D2229:106b-26: yul ma gadh'i bre bo che re re 'byung bar
T02D2229:106b-28: yi dgas kyi tshogs ma lus pa la se gol lan gsum gtogs pas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2229:106b-29: da ni sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i rnam pa ltar blta ba'i byams pa dang /
T02D2229:106b-30: sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu 'khor ba'i rgya
T02D2229:106b-31: mtsho las 'byin par bsam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D2229:106b-33: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba spros par 'gyur ba'i yid las byung ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2229:106b-34: mi bden pa la chags pa yongs su spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi btang snyoms bsgom la /
T02D2229:106b-35: sems can thams cad kyi don la spro ba'i sems
T02D2229:106b-36: kyis ba'i lci ba gtsang ma blangs la chu gtsang
T02D2229:106b-38: aom badzra re khe h'um zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2229:106b-39: sa'i cha gru bzhi pa la sogs pa gang yang rung bar 'dod pa'i mandala byas la /
T02D2229:107a-0: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar @107a * //
T02D2229:107a-2: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D2229:107a-3: h'um sngon po yongs su rdzogs pa'i mi bskyod pas
T02D2229:107a-4: gnon gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa sku mdog sngon po'o
T02D2229:107a-5: // de'i rjes la shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma la /
T02D2229:107a-6: yi ge aom dkar po las rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D2229:107a-7: mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2229:107a-8: dang / de nas lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la
T02D2229:107a-9: yi ge tram ser po las yang dag par byung
T02D2229:107a-10: ba'i sku mdog ser po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya
T02D2229:107a-12: de nas nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la /
T02D2229:107a-13: yi ge hri dmar po las yang dag par byung
T02D2229:107a-14: ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i snang
T02D2229:107a-15: ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar ba'o //
T02D2229:107a-16: de nas byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la yi ge
T02D2229:107a-17: kham ljang gu las byung ba'i mdog ljang gu mi
T02D2229:107a-18: 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i don yod grub pa
T02D2229:107a-19: bsgoms la / aom badzra pushpe h'um zhes pa la
T02D2229:107a-20: sogs pa mngon par zhen pa'i sngags pas 'dod pa
T02D2229:107a-21: thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa dbul bar bya'o
T02D2229:107a-22: bsgoms la / // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po 'di dag ni /
T02D2229:107a-23: na bza' dur smrig bsnams pa /
T02D2229:107a-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ste rnam par snang mdzad ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D2229:107a-26: da la bzhi po ni mi bskyod pa la phyogs pa'o //
T02D2229:107a-27: mi bskyod pa ni sgrub pa po la phyogs pa'o //
T02D2229:107a-28: de dag gi mdun na gsum la skyabs su 'gro
T02D2229:107a-29: ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rtogs pa'i don ji lta
T02D2229:107a-30: ba bzhin du mngon du byas nas gdon par bya'o
T02D2229:107a-31: // de la gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2229:107a-32: sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2229:107a-33: skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2229:107a-35: gsum la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2229:107a-36: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2229:107a-37: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D2229:107a-38: 'gro pa'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D2229:107a-39: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung //
T02D2229:107a-40: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la //
T02D2229:107a-41: byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2229:107a-42: bdag dang gzhan don rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2229:107a-43: bdag gis byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing /
T02D2229:107b-0: sems @107b can 'di dag thams cad mgron gnyer nas //
T02D2229:107b-1: byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi //
T02D2229:107b-2: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog / sdig ba thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02D2229:107b-3: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02D2229:107b-4: gso sbyong 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad ;
T02D2229:107b-5: / bsnyung bar bya ba spyad par bya //
T02D2229:107b-8: tshul khrims tsandan lus la byugs //
T02D2229:107b-9: bsam gtan gyi ni gos kyis g-yogs //
T02D2229:107b-10: byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan //
T02D2229:107b-11: ji ltar bde ba nyid du gnas /
T02D2229:107b-13: aom badzra mandala h'um mu:zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2229:107b-14: de bzhin du 'jam dpal sogs pa yang man ngag ji lta ba bzhin mchod par bya'o //
T02D2229:107b-16: lci ba chu dang bcas pa sbyin pa ste //
T02D2229:107b-17: legs par byugs pa tshul khrims bzod pa ni //
T02D2229:107b-18: srog chags phra mo sel bar byed pa yin //
T02D2229:107b-19: brtson 'grus bya ba dag la 'jug pa'o //
T02D2229:107b-20: bsam gtan de dus rtse gcig byed pa'i sems //
T02D2229:107b-21: shes rab tshogs sogs legs par mdzes pa yin //
T02D2229:107b-22: thub pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor byas pa yis //
T02D2229:107b-23: pha rol phyin pa drug ni des thob shog / nad kun las grol gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur //
T02D2229:107b-24: lha dang mi'i chos zla ba bzhin par mdangs //
T02D2229:107b-25: nor dang gser phyug rgyal po'i rgyud skye bar //
T02D2229:107b-26: bde gshegs gnas mchog lus kyis byas par 'gyur //
T02D2229:107b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi phan yon gyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T02D2229:107b-29: lci ba chu dang me tog gis //
T02D2229:107b-30: rtag tu dkyil 'khor byas nas ni //
T02D2229:107b-31: cung zad phul nas bla ma la //
T02D2229:107b-32: dus gsum du ni gus phyag bya /
T02D2229:107b-33: gzhan dag gi ni sems mgu zhing //
T02D2229:107b-34: rang gi sems kyang 'phel bar byed //
T02D2229:107b-35: bde zhing tshad med nor dang ldan //
T02D2229:107b-36: bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2229:107b-37: pha rol phyin drug rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02D2229:107b-38: sangs rgyas sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2229:107b-39: dkyil 'khor rab tu byed pa po //
T02D2229:107b-40: dpag med yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02D2229:107b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa phan yon rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
T02D2229:107b-42: dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga yis //
T02D2229:107b-43: yang dag shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D2229:107b-44: rtag tu mchod cing bklag par bya //
T02D2229:107b-45: de yi don yang rtogs par bya //
T02D2229:108a-2: tshigs bcad gnyis dang sgo drug pa'i //
T02D2229:108a-3: gzungs dang bzang po spyod pa dang //
T02D2229:108a-4: phung po gsum pa dus gsum du //
T02D2229:108a-5: yi ge gcig nas nyer bzung nas //
T02D2229:108a-6: gsum gyi bar du mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D2229:108a-7: yi dam nyams pa med pa yis //
T02D2229:108a-8: blo ldan ji ltar rnyed pa bklag / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ras ris dang /
T02D2229:108a-10: lugs ma la sogs pa mchod par bya'o //
T02D2229:108a-11: ras ris dang glags bam dang sku gzugs la sogs pa mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2229:108a-12: da ni dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rjes su
T02D2229:108a-13: 'brangs nas cha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga bshad par
T02D2229:108a-14: bya ste / na massa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2229:108a-15: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:108a-17: aom badzrod bha b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:108a-19: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:108a-21: aom dharma dh'a tu garbe sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:108a-23: aom badzra mung+ga ra a'a ko ta ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2229:108a-25: aom dharma a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:108a-27: aom su pra tishtha badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:108a-28: bzhugs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D2229:108a-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma ni sha ta
T02D2229:108a-30: d'i pa te dzva la dzva la dharma dh'a tu
T02D2229:108a-31: garbhe sv'a h'a / rab tu gnas pa'i sngags so //
T02D2229:108a-32: aom sva bh'a ba b'i shuddhe aa ha ra aa
T02D2229:108a-33: ha ra a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha dharma dh'a tu garbhe
T02D2229:108a-34: sv'a h'a / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D2229:108a-35: aom a'a k'a sha dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:108a-36: bzod par gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D2229:108a-37: de lta bu ni tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2229:108a-38: na mo bha ga ba te bee ro tsa na /
T02D2229:108a-44: sa ma ye pras ma ye /
T02D2229:108a-48: ta ramphe ya sho ba ti ma h'a te dza ni rku le /
T02D2229:108a-50: sarba buddh'a dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:108a-52: bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bzlas te /
T02D2229:108a-54: de la rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de
T02D2229:108a-55: snyed kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'gyur gyi mchod rten
T02D2229:108a-56: byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2229:108a-57: sa bcu'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2229:108b-0: @108b myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
T02D2229:108b-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan
T02D2229:108b-2: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs te /
T02D2229:108b-3: gzungs 'di ni phan yon dpag tu med do //
T02D2229:108b-4: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dat /
T02D2229:108b-5: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i
T02D2229:108b-6: ma h'a shra ma na:tshigs su bcad bas rab gnas
T02D2229:108b-7: byas la / na mo bha ga ba te ratna ke tu r'a dz'a ya /
T02D2229:108b-8: ta th'a ga ta y'arha te samyaksam buddh'a ya /
T02D2229:108b-10: aom ratne ma h'a ratne ratna bo dh'a sv'ah'a /
T02D2229:108b-11: zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa 'di brjod cing
T02D2229:108b-12: mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs ba byas
T02D2229:108b-13: nas / mchod rten gcig la phyag byas pas ;
T02D2229:108b-14: mchod rten bye ba la phyag la sogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2229:108b-15: 'jim pa la sogs pa la mchod rten bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2229:108b-16: 'di dag thams cad khyad par can du yongs su
T02D2229:108b-17: bsngo ba las ni khyad par can gyi 'bras bu
T02D2229:108b-18: skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba shes
T02D2229:108b-19: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs pa'i
T02D2229:108b-20: yongs su bsngo ba chen pos yongs su bsngo bar
T02D2229:108b-21: bya'o // de yang 'di ltar bya ste /
T02D2229:108b-22: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T02D2229:108b-23: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas
T02D2229:108b-25: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rigs gang yin pa dang /
T02D2229:108b-27: mtshan nyid ji lta ba dang /
T02D2229:108b-28: rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /
T02D2229:108b-29: chos nyid gang yin pas yang dag par gnas pa
T02D2229:108b-30: de dag gis ji lta ba mkhyen pa de ltar
T02D2229:108b-31: bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D2229:108b-32: de dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na
T02D2229:108b-33: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad chub tu
T02D2229:108b-34: bsdos pa ltar / bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod do //
T02D2229:108b-36: dge ba'i las 'di bdag gis byas pa yis //
T02D2229:108b-37: ring por mi thogs 'jig rten sangs rgyas nas //
T02D2229:108b-38: 'gro la phan phyir chos ni ston byad cing //
T02D2229:108b-39: sdug bsngal mang pos mnar ba'i sems can grol gyur
T02D2229:108b-40: cig / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba
T02D2229:108b-41: dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2229:108b-42: gang dang gang gis gang 'tsho ba //
T02D2229:108b-43: 'tsho ba dag pa de rgyal ba //
T02D2229:109a-2: sman bzhin du ni bsam par bya //
T02D2229:109a-3: zhes bya ba'i de'i rjes la ji ltar rnyed pa'i zas la /
T02D2229:109a-4: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpan na rv'a ta /
T02D2229:109a-6: zhes bya bas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2229:109a-8: aom a'a:sarba buddha bo dhi satva bhyo badzra nee bi dyee h'um zhes bya bas bshos gtsang dbul lo //
T02D2229:109a-9: aom ha ri ti ma h'a yakshi ni ha ra
T02D2229:109a-10: ha ra sarba p'a pam na ksha na sv'a h'a
T02D2229:109a-11: / zhes brjod la zan chang bu gnyis sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2229:109a-12: aom aa gra pa ni t'a si bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:109a-13: zhes bya bas ni zan gyi chang bu gsum pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2229:109a-15: a'om a'a: h'um zhes bya bas /
T02D2229:109a-16: rang gi snod kyi zan byin gyis brlab cing dug
T02D2229:109a-17: la sogs pa rnams zhi bar gyur gyi par du
T02D2229:109a-18: dang po mthe bong dang srin lag gis bza' bar
T02D2229:109a-19: bya'o // de'i rjes la ji ltar bde bar bzod pa'i zas lhag ma la /
T02D2229:109a-20: aom autstshit bandi aa si bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D2229:109a-21: zhes bya bas lhag ma'i chang bu sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2229:109a-22: lhag ma gzhan byin gyis ma brlabs pa ni yongs su dor bar bya'o //
T02D2229:109a-24: gtor ma btang zhing bshos gtsang dbul //
T02D2229:109a-25: 'phrog ma dang po chang bu dang //
T02D2229:109a-26: lnga po lhag ma gtang ba ste //
T02D2229:109a-31: blo bde ba yongs su dag cing khyad par can gyi bde ba dang ldan pas /
T02D2229:109a-32: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2229:109a-33: lan gsum gyi bar du 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02D2229:109a-34: rgyal po dang ni yon bdag dang //
T02D2229:109a-35: sems can phung po gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2229:109a-36: tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs //
T02D2229:109a-37: rtag tu bde ba thob gyur cig //
T02D2229:109a-40: yongs su dag pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ji ltar 'dod pas gnas par bya'o //
T02D2229:109a-42: dge pa'i bshes gnyen bsten nas lhan cig spyod pa dang /
T02D2229:109a-46: rtogs pa brjod pa'i gtam gyis nyin dang mtshan du yid shin tu gnas bas gnas par bya'o //
T02D2229:109a-47: de nas phyi dro'i dus su yang bzlas pa dang
T02D2229:109a-48: bstod pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2229:109b-0: skye ba med @109b pa'i yid kyis byas la /
T02D2229:109b-1: yi ge aa la sogs pas gtor ma byin la rnal 'byor gyi gnyid kyis nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2229:109b-2: au sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu 'jug / nye bar zhi ba'i dag bsnyen te //
T02D2229:109b-3: sems can rnams la nye bar phan //
T02D2229:109b-4: thams cad nye bar phan gyur pas //
T02D2229:109b-5: rtag tu sdig pa spong bar byed //
T02D2229:109b-6: sdig pa can dang 'grogs pa spang //
T02D2229:109b-7: skyes bu sdig pa spong bar byed //
T02D2229:109b-8: kun du sdig pa bshags byed pa'o //
T02D2229:109b-9: sgro btags thams cad rnam par grol //
T02D2229:109b-10: ting nge 'dzin la legs mnyam 'jog / kun du mchog tu dga' ba yis //
T02D2229:109b-11: mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub ;
T02D2229:109b-12: / dus kun du ni 'bad med pas //
T02D2229:109b-13: snying rjes yongs su skyong ba nyid //
T02D2229:109b-14: sdug bsngal gyur kyang mi 'dod min //
T02D2229:109b-15: phan pa mchog ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D2229:109b-16: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis yi ge bzhi pa'i don dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bsnyen no //
T02D2229:109b-17: dge ba'i las ni yongs su byas //
T02D2229:109b-18: bsod nams tshogs ni nye bar bsags //
T02D2229:109b-19: goms pa'i dbang gis sad pa bzhin //
T02D2229:109b-20: dge ba rmi lam nyid na 'ang byed //
T02D2229:109b-21: 'gro ba thams cad dri med pa'i //
T02D2229:109b-22: gzugs brnyan gzhan du mthong 'gyur na //
T02D2229:109b-23: thams cad smra ba'i skyes bu ltar //
T02D2229:109b-24: rjes su mi dmigs bzhin du byed ;
T02D2229:109b-25: / de lta bas na phyir mi ldog //
T02D2229:109b-27: de ltar nyin dang mtshan du rgyun mi 'chad par
T02D2229:109b-28: bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa byang chub
T02D2229:109b-29: kyi snying po'i bar du sems can la phan pa
T02D2229:109b-30: dang / bde bas yang dag par gnas so zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2229:109b-31: dbu ma'i don la mchog gzhol ba //
T02D2229:109b-32: nam mkha' snying po zhes bya bas //
T02D2229:109b-33: dang po las la mnyam 'jog cing //
T02D2229:109b-34: yi dam nyid du 'di byed pa //
T02D2229:109b-36: bram ze'i rigs la zhi ba'i sems //
T02D2229:109b-37: nam mkha'i snying por gsol btab bdag gis dang po'i las //
T02D2229:109b-38: cho ga'i tshig 'ga' tsam zhig bstan par byas pa 'dis //
T02D2229:109b-39: byang chub goms par byas nas myur du nyon mongs pa'i //
T02D2229:109b-40: sdig pa'i blo yi dri ma'i rab rib 'dis sel shog / dang po las pa'i chog 'dis //
T02D2229:109b-41: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa //
T02D2229:109b-42: dang po'i las can de dag dang //
T02D2229:110a-1: med thob par shog / slob dpon mkhas pa chen
T02D2229:110a-2: po nges par sbyangs pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo
T02D2229:110a-3: rjes mdzad pa lta ba ngan pa sel bzhes bya
T02D2229:110a-5: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma badzra p'a ni'i zhal snga nas dang /
